document.full_text: consumer goods giants procter & gamble and unilever will both raise detergent and soap prices in china by up to 15 percent next month, local media reported, underscoring the battle the government faces with inflation.
document.title: p&g, unilever up china prices, fuel inflation fears
lines_and_colors: consumer goods giants procter & gamble and unilever will both raise detergent and soap prices in china by up to 15 percent next month, local media reported, underscoring the battle the government faces with inflation.
